articles.title: Leandro Paredes Explains Confusion Over Messi Mistreatment at PSG - PSG Talk
articles.description: Midfielder Leandro Paredes discussed his confusion over how Lionel Messi was treated during his two seasons at Paris Saint-Germain.
articles.content:
The Lionel Messi era didnt go as planned for Paris Saint-Germain. The capital club brought the 35-year-old in hopes of winning the UEFA Champions League. However, that never occurred.
